body:
Ok, after a lot of debugging I finally figured out what the problem is. I'm accessing the svg element via:

this.htmlElement = this.element.nativeElement;
this.host = d3.select(this.element.nativeElement);
this.svg = this.host.append('svg');

For some reason the * >>> doesn't work here. If however I adjust the css file to

:host .label-text {
    ...
}

it works just fine.

Hope that helps someone else with the same problem...
title: Angular2 D3 - CSS styling is not applied
